paper_abstract: Several relations between the coefficients of the permanental and characteristic polynomials were given by Gutman and Cash [MATCH Commun. Math. Comput. Chem. 45 (2002) 55-70]. In this paper, some more and general connections between those coefficients are presented.
paper_title: Remarks on the Relations Between the Permanental and Characteristic Polynomials of Fullerenes
